sen.khyber.apcs.triangle

Class Triangle

  • Object
    • Polygon
      • Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Polygon
    most of the important methods are in the class Polygon because things like the finding the area and perimeter can be abstracted to any sized polygon immutable except for Polygon memoization all methods are referentially transparent except for random()
    Author:
    Khyber Sen
